KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Structure compareLT 003
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareGT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLT function to compare two Structures and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding keys and values of each Structure are compared to determine whether one Structure is lesser than the other.

Syntax.Note: The first Structure is greater than the second Structure.
